column5: I am looking for Owner Ultrahead Saltwater Bullet Jigs in 1 oz , I can find them on the net but I would perfer to buy direct if I can ! I can find them smaller but none in the 1 oz range . Has anyone seen these jigheads around or can recomend a store to call  Thanks
I sourced out some owner Flip "N" Pitch hooks, which ive never seen around here, and poured them in both tube jigs and bullet heads, tough and very sharp, with a 60 degree offset.
